Esoterica.Name: ZT_CLBY
Esoterica.Desc: The five-colored brilliance shines, covering the beginning of the story of the sky. Ye Fan and others traveled through the ancient road of the starry sky to the Big Dipper through the power of the five-colored altar. This is where the legend begins.
Esoterica.EffectDesc:
After learning, you can unlock the Forbidden City and the five-color altar 
The five-colored altar produces the most important building items and props of the sky series. The Forbidden City has hidden secrets and enhanced attributes. 
The five-colored altar produces five-colored god stones and bodhi 
. Forbidden land produces holy springs and holy fruits that increase attributes.

Esoterica.Name: ZT_LXDT
Esoterica.Desc: Ye Fan and others descended on the Forbidden City of Beidou, which is one of the seven forbidden areas of life. Ye Fan was lucky to mention the Holy Fruit, and a few friends of Pembo successfully rushed out of the Forbidden City of Ancient Forbidden City. Dongtian kept. And experienced the birth of the tomb of the demon emperor.
Esoterica.EffectDesc: After learning, you can unlock Lingxu Dongtian \nLingxu Dongtian produces Baicao liquid, which can be used to break through the skills and build the foundation.

Esoterica.Name: ZT_GWSTSFYX
Esoterica.DisplayName: Dare to ask God if there is an immortal
Esoterica.Desc: After experiencing a series of life and death encounters, Ye Fan can see that the cultivator is no different from a mortal person. He is also greedy. After gaining the sacred heart of the demon emperor, he was held by the demon tribe, then met the East Deity God Ji Haoyue, escaped from the chaos, and was captured by Ji Ziyue. He resisted Ji Ziyue under the influence of yin and yang.
Esoterica.EffectDesc: After learning, you can unlock the Bronze Immortal Hall \nThe Bronze Immortal Hall, a more mysterious place in the heavenly world, can gain Xuanhuang Qi through experience, and gain attribute enhancement through secrets.

Esoterica.Name: ZT_TXM
Esoterica.Desc: Dare to ask if there is an immortal in heaven, and what is the purpose of spiritual practice. Ye Fan and Ji Ziyue both came to Taixuan Peak with serious thoughts. 108 immortal mountains were scattered, and the two worshiped to get started.
Esoterica.EffectDesc: After learning, you can unlock the place Taixuanmen \nTaixuanmen, a sect in the middle and south areas of the heavenly world. Although it does not have the strong strength of the ancient family, it is also the top 100 superpower in the south.

Esoterica.Name: ZT_HY
Esoterica.Desc: During his escape with Ji Ziyue, Ye Fan was hunted down by the Ji family because he learned the void fingerprints taught by Ji Ziyue. Chased to the realm of fire by all major forces.
Esoterica.EffectDesc: After learning, you can unlock the fire domain. \nThe fire domain is divided into nine layers. Each layer produces different flames, which have different temperatures and are quite dangerous. However, each type of fire can obtain certain attribute improvements.

Esoterica.Name: ZT_ZJC
Esoterica.Desc: After practicing for some time in the fire domain, Ye Fan came to Beiyu, Zhangjia Village in the North, while the world gradually forgot his existence, and became associated with Zhangjiacun villagers because of the surrounding bandits.
Esoterica.EffectDesc: After learning, you can unlock Zhangjia Village \nThere are many rogues around Zhangjia Village. Killing can get many sources and even god sources, and you can unlock Purple Mountain through Zhangjia Village.

Esoterica.Name: ZT_TCGK
Esoterica.Desc: After coming out of the Purple Mountain, Ye Fan plundered Liu Kou in order to break through and harvested a lot of resources. He also tasted the sweetness and tried to find opportunities in the Taichu ancient mine.
Esoterica.EffectDesc: After learning, you can unlock the Taichu Ancient Mine \nThe secret of the Taichu Ancient Mine can obtain the materials of the emperor soldiers, and through the training, you can also obtain the materials of the Shenbingfang.

Esoterica.Name: ZT_YCSD
Esoterica.Desc: Ye Fan mentioned a big black dog in Zhangjiacun. Under the leadership of the black emperor, he found the Western Emperor's Scriptures and came to the Holy Land of Yaochi.
Esoterica.EffectDesc: After learning, you can unlock the Yaochi Holy Land \nYaochi Holy Land, where you can get the peach and water attributes. The source of God is the place to get materials and exercises.

Esoterica.Name: ZT_YZZ
Esoterica.Desc: Ye Fan came to Yunze to avoid the wind.
Esoterica.EffectDesc: After learning, you can unlock Yunze Prefecture \nThe secret of Yunze Prefecture can get the remains of the Eucharist, and get a single secret practice method.

Esoterica.Name: ZT_DDLQ

Esoterica.EffectDesc: After learning, you can unlock the tomb of the emperor \nThe method of making the chaotic bed in the tomb of the emperor and how to obtain the chaotic stone.

Esoterica.Name: ZT_WLC
Esoterica.Desc: After Ye Fan broke through to the fourth level, he came to the Frozen Palace in order to find a better way to resolve the road injury.
Esoterica.EffectDesc: After learning, you can unlock Wanlong Nest \nWanlong Nest is the place where you can get five kinds of spiritual plants covering the sky in the current version. .
